definitions.definition: someone who has never had sex:
examples: She remained a virgin until she was over thirty.

definitions.definition: a person with no experience of a particular activity
A virgin forest or area of land has not yet been cultivated (= used to grow crops) or used by people:
examples: The railway is being extended into areas of virgin forest.

definitions.definition: Virgin oil, especially olive oil, is made directly from pressing the fruit, rather than by using heat:
pure and not spoiled, especially when describing something white:
examples: a virgin sheet of paper (= one not written on)
